column1: # Many readings are shown bracketed, and have been omitted as likely estimates from other sites:
# The whole of 1952 except February omitted (with virtually the same bracketed readings also being present for the Stye B Seathwaite gauge for this year).
# Readings for 1932, 1933 and the first six months of 1934 (the first years of operations for this gauge) are nearly all identical to those for the Stye B Seathwaite.
# After mid 1932 the readings of the two gauges are usually slightly different. It seems possible that the readings for one or other gauge for 1932
# to mid 1934 were confused with those from the other gauge. All non-bracketed readings have been retained.
# The station is still active according to MIDAS.
